function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in outcomes due to co-evolutionary dynamics of people, socio-cultural, and ecological systems","Impact":"Ineffective adaptation to changing environments and disease propagation in built environments","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and evaluation of co-evolutionary dynamics to anticipate and plan for changes","Technologies":"Data analytics and predictive modeling for dynamic systems","People":"Researchers, urban planners, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate accommodation of regional distinctions and local ecosystems in green assessment methods","Impact":"Ineffective local adaptation to climate change and disease propagation","Mitigation":"Incorporation of local knowledge and community engagement in green assessment methods","Technologies":"Community-based participatory research and geographic information systems","People":"Local communities, environmental advocates, policymakers","Owner":"Environmental organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Limited focus on understanding and engaging local ecosystems and their processes","Impact":"Ineffective resilience of projects to adapt to local disease propagation","Mitigation":"Integration of place-based knowledge and expertise in project planning and development","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis and ecological modeling","People":"Project developers, environmental scientists, local community leaders","Owner":"Development companies, environmental consulting firms"}]}
